Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • Context

  • public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
    Context class for the algorithm. This class contains the event engine for the applicaton and does the actual communication with the muTrade server. Application object containing the trading logic is associated with this class. Also, this class is used to tweak various parameters, which are global to the application.

      • enableLogging

        public void enableLogging(LogLevel level)
        Enable logging of various events.
        Parameters:
        level - LogLevel for how much log we want to generate These logs also go to syslog on Linux/UNIX and to Event Log on Windows

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(Instrument t)
        Susbscribe market data for a particular instrument
        Parameters:
        t - Instrument Note:- Instrument must be called for the string before calling this method.

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe(Instrument t)
        Unsusbscribe market data for a previously subscribed instrument
        Parameters:
        t - Instrument Note:- loadInstrument must be called for the string before calling this method.

      • getInstance

        public static Context getInstance()
        Get an Instance of the Context class
        Returns:
        Context Context class is a Singleton class, which will have only one instance. This instance can be accessed using the getInstance method.
